errors.error_description: Includes unnecessary dependencies (cvxpy, sympy) that are not required for GPkit
correction_candidates: Remove cvxpy and sympy from the installation command
Remove only sympy but keep cvxpy for advanced optimization
Replace cvxpy and sympy with mosek and cvxopt packages
Move cvxpy and sympy to optional dependencies section
errors.golden_answer: Remove cvxpy and sympy from the installation command

errors.error_description: Invalid pytest command with non-existent --enable-solver parameters
correction_candidates: Change to python -m pytest gpkit/tests/ without the --enable-solver flags
Change to python -m unittest discover gpkit.tests
errors.golden_answer: Change to python -m pytest gpkit/tests/ without the --enable-solver flags
